price: Yoo ajaja kee fudhachuu didanis “Ani waan isin hojjattan irraa qulqulluudha” jedhiin.
arabic: فَإِنۡ عَصَوۡكَ فَقُلۡ إِنِّي بَرِيٓءٞ مِّمَّا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fa-in ʿaṣawka faqul innī barīon mimmā taʿmalūna
